mapper.select: SELECT P.id, P.simple_name name, P.accumulated_income, M.ID manager_id, M.NAME manager_name, M.LOGO manager_logo, M.REVIEW manager_review FROM PE_PRODUCT P, PE_MANAGER_PRODUCT MP, PE_MANAGER M WHERE P.id = MP.product_id AND MP.MANAGER_ID = M.ID AND P.recommend_location = 2 AND P.status = 2 ORDER BY P.ACCUMULATED_INCOME DESC LIMIT 0,4
